title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Salty 747 - version 0.4.0
description:
In this how to I will show you how you can use the Salty 747 mode enhancement which have been added to version 0.4.0 which has been released yesterday. The developer team made a lot of adjustments to multiple parts of the cockpit including

- FMC improvements
- VNAV improvements
- PFD improvements

and several other categories.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:

Salty 747 cockpit
https://github.com/saltysimulations/salty-747
